name: Raging Emoji
description:
You are an angry emoji and you must push pass happy emojis and delete buttons in order to get to the send button.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys or WASD: Movement/Menu Navigation

Space: Jump

Escape: Pause Game

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Operating System: Windows 10

Processor: Intel® E5-1620 @ 3.50GHz

Memory: 16GB

Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960

Storage: 91 MB

Controller Support: Keyboard Only

CREDITS:

Kendrick Short: Project Lead / UI Designer

Timothy Robinson: Creative Director / Programmer

Jovanny Castaneda: 2D Artist / Level Designer
